content: crochet christmas baubles are a charming and unique addition to any christmas tree and with this free pattern you can make your own in no time > free pattern is available on the blog here 1 whether you re a seasoned crochet pro or just starting creating your diy christmas baubles is a great way to showcase your creativity and add a personal touch to your holiday decorations this pattern is part of the crochet christmas advent calendar during the advent calendar we will share with you 24 different crochet patterns haven t subscribed yet you can subscribe and read all about the advent calendar here 1 materials sport weight yarn- yarn art jeans 55% cotton 45% acryl 50 g 160 m in different colors sparkle yarn i used a local brand from stenli yarns- stenli brocat crochet hook size 3mm fiberfill for stuffing or a plastic/styrofoam bauble tapestry needle 1 https //www passionatecrafter com/crochet-bell-ornaments-free-pattern/
